featured.text: Born and raised in Boston, he began his career at age eighteen in his hometown, working as an apprentice at a printing company.

definition.zh_def: 學徒；徒弟，指在某一技藝或職業中接受訓練的人。
definition.en_def: A person who is learning a trade from a skilled employer, having agreed to work for a fixed period at low wages.
definition.example: She started as an apprentice in the bakery before becoming a master baker.
